price: چې وارث شي زما په دین کې او وارث شي د کورنۍ د یعقوب -علیه السلام- په دین کې، او وګرځوه هغه لره غوره.
arabic: يَرِثُنِي وَيَرِثُ مِنۡ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَۖ وَٱجۡعَلۡهُ رَبِّ رَضِيّٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yarithunī wayarithu min āli yaʿqūba wa-ij'ʿalhu rabbi raḍiyyan
